name: Dungeon Buster (Tanoshee Games)
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK Gamejam 2021.

This game joins together the dungeon crawler and block breaking puzzle genres.
You play as Dakota Johnson as she raids an ancient dungeon.
Collect 30 pieces of treasure and then find an exit to win.
Break blocks to carve paths and uncover more of the dungeon. Just be sure not to let Dakota fall.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move.
Use the mouse to destroy blocks.

At this stage, the game is more of a proof of concept. However, more updates will follow after the jam ends.
